snippet.title: Warhammer Online Production Video Podcast #4 - Animation
snippet.description: In this month's Production Podcast, we follow Lead Animator Jeremy Dale as he breaks down the process of character animation in Warhammer Online. You'll get a look at the progression from idea to in-game, as Jeremy leads you through the exciting world of hand-drawn concept sketches, live-action tryouts, high-end 3D animation programs, and most exciting of all . . . spreadsheets.
